name: headgeekette
text:
@roytang I learned how to do Zettelkasten by not introducing anything digital into it. It was all pen and A6 paper. Once I figured out how Zettelkasten worked, that's the only time I introduced Obsidian into it.

Zettelkasten is actually quite easy to figure out. One idea per A6 page (not sheet). Give it an ID and a keyword or two. Write ID+keyword to index. File. Repeat.

Small sheets keep your thoughts short and concise while being able to stand on its own.

That's all there is to it.
